releaseNotes.en: WayPoint 1.3.0: The Open Architecture Update. Fully customizable interface (Tags, Scores, Status Info), programmable floating toolbar (reorderable actions), and open scoring algorithm with path multipliers. Includes configuration import/export for portability.
releaseNotes.zh-Hans: WayPoint 1.3.0: 开放架构体系更新。全面开放界面定制（标签、权重、状态信息）、可编程浮动工具栏（支持动作排序与开关）以及开放评分算法系数与路径倍率。新增配置导入导出，支持跨机同步。
